hero.title: Embrace Meaningful Connections
hero.description: Where uniqueness thrives. Unlock the potencial of blockchain technology, elevate your event experience.

section1.title: Elevate your Event Experience
section1.description: Unleash the power of Blockchain technology to elevate your event experience. Seamlessly create, manage, and customize events without intermediaries. Embrace a transparent and secure platform that redefines the way you connect and share unforgettable moments.

section2.title: Your Immutable Pass to Unforgettable Moments
section2.description: With MeetDapp's NFT tickets, your pass to unforgettable moments is now secured on the Blockchain. Even if you misplace your ticket, fear not - the immutable Blockchain ensures your access remains intact, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the magic of each event.

section3.title: Event Records on the Blockchain
section3.description: The power of Blockchain brings an unparalleled level of transparency and immutability to event records. Each event's history, from creation to attendance, is permanently recorded, eliminating doubts and fostering trust among event organizers and attendees alike.

section4.title: Your Safety, Our Priority
section4.description: Safeguard your event experience. Our platform ensures each event remains secure and transparent, empowering you with peace of mind. Your personal data remains private, allowing you to focus wholeheartedly on what truly matters: connecting with others in a worry-free environment.

modal.header-tooltip-desc: The wallet serves as an account to store and manage your digital assets on the blockchain.

modal.popup.phone-body: Your country code will be detected automatically, but if you're using a phone number from a different country, you'll need to enter the correct country code manually.
modal.social.policy: We do not store any data related to your social logins.
